   .. py:method:: from_bbox(bbox)
      :classmethod:


      Construct a Polygon from a bounding box (4-tuple).



   .. py:property:: num_interior_rings

      Return the number of interior rings.


   .. py:attribute:: exterior_ring


   .. py:attribute:: shell


   .. py:property:: tuple

      Get the tuple for each ring in this Polygon.


   .. py:attribute:: coords


   .. py:property:: kml
